entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating early this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Temperature rising to minus 1 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 this evening. Temperature rising to minus 1 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023
